00112 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2ElemContent : public wxXml2Wrapper
00113 {
00114         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2ElemContent)
00115 
00116         
00117         xmlElementContent *m_cont;
00118 
00119 protected:
00120 
00121         void Destroy() {
00122                 if (m_cont) xmlFree(m_cont);
00123                 SetAsEmpty();
00124         }
00125 
00126         void SetAsEmpty()
00127                 { m_cont = NULL; }
00128 
00129         void  Copy(const wxXml2ElemContent &n) {
00130                 UnwrappingOld();
00131                 m_cont = n.m_cont;
00132                 JustWrappedNew();
00133         }
00134 
00135         int &GetPrivate() const
00136                 { return (int &)(m_cont); }
00137 
00138 public:
00139 
00140         wxXml2ElemContent(xmlElementContent *cont = NULL) : m_cont(cont) {}
00141         wxXml2ElemContent(const wxString &name, wxXml2ElementContentType val)
00142                 { m_cont=NULL; Create(name, val); }
00143 
00144         virtual ~wxXml2ElemContent() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00145 
00146 
00147 
00148         bool IsUnlinked() const
00149                 { return TRUE; }
00150 
00151         bool IsNonEmpty() const
00152                 { return m_cont != NULL; }
00153 
00154 
00155 public:         // operators
00156         
00157         bool operator==(const wxXml2ElemContent &decl) const;
00158         bool operator!=(const wxXml2ElemContent &decl) const    { return !(*this == decl); }
00159 
00160         wxXml2ElemContent &operator=(const wxXml2ElemContent &decl)
00161                 { Copy(decl); return *this; }
00162 
00163 
00164 public:         // miscellaneous
00165 
00166         void Create(const wxString &name, wxXml2ElementContentType val) {
00167 
00168                 m_cont = xmlNewElementContent(WX2XML(name), (xmlElementContentType)val);
00169         }
00170 
00171         xmlElementContent *GetObj() const
00172                 { return m_cont; }
00173 };

00441 class WXXMLDLLEXPORT wxXml2DTD : public wxXml2Wrapper
00442 {
00443         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS(wxXml2DTD)
00444 
00445         
00446         xmlDtd *m_dtd;
00447 
00448 protected:
00449 
00450         void Destroy() {
00451                 if (m_dtd) xmlFreeDtd(m_dtd);
00452                 SetAsEmpty();
00453         }
00454 
00455         void SetAsEmpty()
00456                 { m_dtd = NULL; }
00457 
00458         void Copy(const wxXml2DTD &dtd) {
00459                 UnwrappingOld();
00460                 m_dtd = dtd.m_dtd;
00461                 JustWrappedNew();
00462         }
00463 
00464         int &GetPrivate() const
00465                 { return (int &)(m_dtd->_private); }
00466 
00468         void SetRoot(wxXml2BaseNode &node);
00469 
00470 public:
00471 
00473         wxXml2DTD() : m_dtd(NULL) {}
00474 
00477         wxXml2DTD(const wxString &file) : m_dtd(NULL) 
00478                 { Load(file); }
00479 
00481     wxXml2DTD(const wxXml2Document &doc,
00482                                 const wxString &name, const wxString &externalid,
00483                                 const wxString &systemid) : m_dtd(NULL) 
00484                 { Create(doc, name, externalid, systemid); }
00485 
00487         wxXml2DTD(xmlDtd *dtd) : m_dtd(dtd)
00488                 { JustWrappedNew(); }
00489 
00491         wxXml2DTD(const wxXml2DTD &dtd) : m_dtd(NULL)
00492                 { Copy(dtd); }
00493 
00496     virtual ~wxXml2DTD() { DestroyIfUnlinked(); }
00497 
00498 
00499 public:         // operators
00500 
00501         bool operator==(const wxXml2DTD &ns) const;
00502         bool operator!=(const wxXml2DTD &p) const               { return !(*this == p); }
00503 
00504         wxXml2DTD &operator=(const wxXml2DTD &dtd)
00505                 { Copy(dtd); return *this; }
00506 
00507 public:         // miscellaneous
00508 
00510         void Create(const wxXml2Document &doc,
00511                                 const wxString &name, const wxString &externalid,
00512                                 const wxString &systemid);
00513 
00514 
00518         bool Load(wxInputStream &, wxString *pErr = NULL);
00519         
00521         bool Load(const wxString &filename, wxString *pErr = NULL);
00522 
00524         int Save(wxOutputStream &) const;

00527         bool Save(const wxString &filename) const;

00532         bool LoadFullDTD(wxString *pErr = NULL);
00533 
00534 
00535 public:         // checkers
00536 
00538         bool IsOk() const;
00539 
00541         bool IsNonEmpty() const
00542                 { return m_dtd != NULL; }
00543 
00546         bool IsUnlinked() const
00547                 { if (!m_dtd) return TRUE; return (m_dtd->parent == NULL); }
00548 
00553         bool IsExternalReference() const;
00554 
00562         bool IsSystemSubset() const;
00563 
00572         bool IsPublicSubset() const;
00573 
00582         bool IsFullDTD() const
00583                 { return !IsExternalReference(); }
00584 
00585 public:         // getters
00586     
00590         wxString GetExternalID() const
00591                 { if (IsPublicSubset()) return m_dtd->ExternalID; return wxEmptyString; }
00592 
00598         wxString GetExternalURI() const
00599                 { if (IsPublicSubset()) return m_dtd->SystemID; return wxEmptyString; }
00600 
00604     wxString GetSystemID() const
00605                 { if (IsSystemSubset()) return m_dtd->SystemID; return wxEmptyString; }
00606 
00610     wxString GetName() const                    { return m_dtd->name; } 
00611 
00613         xmlDtd *GetObj() const                          { return m_dtd; }
00614         
00618         wxXml2BaseNode GetRoot() const;
00619 
00620 public:         // setters
00621 
00622     void SetName(const wxString &p);
00623         void SetSystemID(const wxString &u);
00624         void SetExternalID(const wxString &u);
00625 
00628         void SetExternalURI(const wxString &u)
00629                 { SetSystemID(u); }
00630 
00632         void SetRoot(wxXml2ElemDecl &node)
00633                 { SetRoot((wxXml2BaseNode &)node); }
00634         void SetRoot(wxXml2AttrDecl &node)
00635                 { SetRoot((wxXml2BaseNode &)node); }
00636         void SetRoot(wxXml2EntityDecl &node)
00637                 { SetRoot((wxXml2BaseNode &)node); }

00644                                 const wxXml2ElemContent &content = wxXml2EmptyElemContent);

00646         void AddAttrDecl(const wxString &element,
